messages.author: Sarah Chen
messages.text: Heads up team - base template v2.3 is live as of 2026-01-28. All new stores now require 400A electrical panels instead of 200A.

messages.author: Jennifer Liu
messages.text: Increased HVAC and lighting load requirements. We saw undersized panels causing issues in 3 stores last quarter.

messages.author: Sarah Chen
messages.text: Makes sense. This will add about $5-8K to electrical costs per store, but better to spec it correctly upfront.

messages.author: Tom Wilson
messages.text: Exactly. I've updated the cost model templates to reflect the new 400A standard.

threads.summary: Base template v2.3 released with updated electrical panel requirements (200A → 400A) to address load issues.
